text.div:
SupplyRequestReason

Why the supply item was requested

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/supplyrequest-reason defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
patient-care Patient CareThe supply has been requested for use in direct patient care.
ward-stock Ward StockThe supply has been requested for for creating or replenishing ward stock.

name: SupplyRequestReason
description: Why the supply item was requested

concept.definition: The supply has been requested for use in direct patient care.
The supply has been requested for for creating or replenishing ward stock.
